Name: Counter-Strike Neo
Description: Released on Namco N2 in 2003.

SetupDetails.Details:
• If you have a "contents2.bin" file, extract contents to some folder (ignore extract warnings).
  • Open folder, and open "csneo2" folder and then "linux" folder.
  • Download missing files here.
  • Extract files to "\csneo2\linux\"
  • Game executable is "\csneo2\linux\hlds_amd", set this within TeknoParrotUI GAME SETTINGS for Counter-Strike Neo
  • Launch the game with TeknoParrotUI (may take awhile to boot)
  • At the card screen, using your keyboard press Alt+F7 to open the console
  • At the console type: login 12
  • Close the console by pressing Alt+F7 on your keyboard
  • Click OK, then enter your name at the prompt and click button.
  • Game will say something, click the left option. Will take some time to load after click, don't press anything.
  • There's a menu here, but open your console again with Alt+F7.
  • To load a map, type (for example): map neo_06collision
  • Map is now loading and game is starting, ready for others to connect

Second player join

  • Follow same game launching steps to get to main menu
  • In console (Alt+F7) type: connect + "ip address of running game"
BulletPoints: If you have a "contents2.bin" file, extract contents to some folder (ignore extract warnings).
Open folder, and open "csneo2" folder and then "linux" folder.
Download missing files here.
Extract files to "\csneo2\linux\"
Game executable is "\csneo2\linux\hlds_amd", set this within TeknoParrotUI GAME SETTINGS for Counter-Strike Neo
Launch the game with TeknoParrotUI (may take awhile to boot)
At the card screen, using your keyboard press Alt+F7 to open the console
At the console type: login 12
Close the console by pressing Alt+F7 on your keyboard
Click OK, then enter your name at the prompt and click button.
Game will say something, click the left option. Will take some time to load after click, don't press anything.
There's a menu here, but open your console again with Alt+F7.
To load a map, type (for example): map neo_06collision
Map is now loading and game is starting, ready for others to connect
Follow same game launching steps to get to main menu
In console (Alt+F7) type: connect + "ip address of running game"

SetupDetails.Details:
• Game executable is 'hummer_Master.elf' in root dir or <root>/disk0/.

Shader fixes

  • If you have a non-GTX 1660 / RTX gpu, download this shaderfix: Hummer_ShaderFix.7z
  • If you have a GTX 1660 / RTX gpu (or if you notice lots of flickering in-game), download this shaderfix: Hummer_FlickerFix.7z
  • Extract the appropriate shaderfix zip into folder with 'hummer_Master.elf' and overwrite existing files.
BulletPoints: Game executable is 'hummer_Master.elf' in root dir or <root>/disk0/.
If you have a non-GTX 1660 / RTX gpu, download this shaderfix: Hummer_ShaderFix.7z
If you have a GTX 1660 / RTX gpu (or if you notice lots of flickering in-game), download this shaderfix: Hummer_FlickerFix.7z
Extract the appropriate shaderfix zip into folder with 'hummer_Master.elf' and overwrite existing files.

CommonIssues.Question: Graphics are flickering, dark, or lots of objects on the screen are just white boxes
CommonIssues.Answer: Be sure to apply the appropriate shader fix found above.

CommonIssues.Question: The AI is way too fast
CommonIssues.Answer: The game was designed to run at 30fps internally. Go into the data-hummer/config folder and open kernel.nut in a text editor, then make sure FRAME_COUNT has not been modified and is set to 30.

SetupDetails.Details:
• Be sure you have a clean dump of Version 2.30
  • Make an account at teknoparrot.com
  • Head to the Online Profiles page and click on the ALL.Net P-ras MULTI link to generate an APM3 ID.
  • Copy that ID into your IDZ game settings in TeknoParrotUI under "General - OnlineID"
  • When you boot the game, be sure to have a button set to insert AIME card, then press that button to load your card and enable progress saving.
BulletPoints: Be sure you have a clean dump of Version 2.30
Make an account at teknoparrot.com
Head to the Online Profiles page and click on the ALL.Net P-ras MULTI link to generate an APM3 ID.
Copy that ID into your IDZ game settings in TeknoParrotUI under "General - OnlineID"
When you boot the game, be sure to have a button set to insert AIME card, then press that button to load your card and enable progress saving.

CommonIssues.Question: Fullscreen Launches Sideways
CommonIssues.Answer: In fullscreen this game always launches in "landscape" mode. Most modern monitors do not support a vertical landscape mode, and so they display it sideways. The game relys on monitor rotation to correctly orient. Either rotate monitor display, or launch in Windowed mode for correct orientation.

CommonIssues.Question: The game says the guns need to be calibrated.
CommonIssues.Answer: Press the "Test" key. Go into IO Check in the Menu. Go to Gun Check. Hold the "Test" button and press the P1 Trigger. Perform the calibration actions. Hold the "Test" button and press the P2 Trigger. Perform the calibration actions. Save and Exit.

CommonIssues.Question: The game says E-Amusement Network cant be configured.
CommonIssues.Answer: Press the "Test" key. Go into Network Options in the Menu. Turn off e-Amusement. Save and Exit.

Description: Released on Team Play PC Based in 2002.

SetupDetails.Details:
• Starting with 'voyager.chd'
  • Get 'chdman.exe' from a MAME release package
  • Open a cmd prompt, navigate to folder where 'chdman.exe' and 'voyager.chd' is
  • Use this command: chdman extracthd --input voyager.chd --output voyager.img
  • Wait for extract..."Extraction complete"
  • With a program like 7-Zip, open 'voyager.img' and extract '0.img', '2.img', and '3.img'
  • You can ignore '1.img' and '4'
  • Create a new folder somewhere and name it something like "Star Trek Voyager"
  • With a program like 7-Zip, right click '3.img' and extract 'stv' folder into your 'Star Trek Voyager' folder (you may need to run 7-Zip as administator)
  • If it yells at you about something, just choose "Yes to all", also ignore any extract warnings
  • With a program like 7-Zip, open '0.img' and navigate to 'home > rocky > stv'
  • Extract contents of 'stv' folder to your 'Star Trek Voyager' folder (you may need to run 7-Zip as administator)
  • With a program like 7-Zip, open '2.img' and open 'stv' folder
  • Extract contents of 'stv' folder to your 'Star Trek Voyager' folder (you may need to run 7-Zip as administator)
  • Game executable is 'trek.e4' found in your 'Star Trek Voyager' folder

Name: Tekken 4
Description: Tekken 4 marked a major shift in the series by introducing fully interactive 3D environments with walls, uneven terrain, and stage hazards that directly influenced combat. It also featured a reworked fighting system with tighter movement, more grounded combat, and a stronger emphasis on positioning, while its darker visual style and cinematic story presentation gave the game a unique identity compared to previous Tekken titles.
MultiplayerDetails: 2 Players can play locally by mapping Player 1 and 2 controls.

SetupDetails.Details: You need both the .ZIP file and the .CHD file. The CHD should be in a folder called 'tekken4' NEXT to the ZIP file, otherwise Play! will complain.

CommonIssues.Question: My game is stuttering and/or slowing down?
CommonIssues.Answer: This is a limitation of current System 2X6 emulation. You can try switching Graphics Backends between OpenGL and Vulkan and see if performance improves.

SetupDetails.Details:
• Starting with 'tokyocop.chd'
  • Get 'chdman.exe' from a MAME release package
  • Open a cmd prompt, navigate to folder where 'chdman.exe' and 'tokyocop.chd' is
  • Use this command: chdman extracthd --input tokyocop.chd --output tokyocop.img
  • Wait for extract..."Extraction complete"
  • With a program like 7-Zip, open 'tokyocop.img' and extract '0.img'
  • You can ignore '1.img' and '2.img'
  • With a program like 7-Zip, right click '0.img' and choose "Extract here"
  • If it yells at you about something, just choose "Yes to all", also ignore any extract warnings
  • Open 'home > joc2001 > joc2001 > Sources > gameport > linux' folder
  • Copy 'gameport' to 'home > joc2001 > joc2001 > salidas' folder
  • The 'salidas' folder is the game folder you need, so rename it to 'Tokyo Cop' or so. copy this folder to wherever you keep your TeknoParrot games. You can safely delete everything else.
  • Game executable is 'gameport' now found in game's root folder ('salidas', which you hopefully renamed)

Name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3
Description: Released on Namco N2 in 2007.

SetupDetails.Details:
Sample config.ini file:

[config]
apiport = 8080
; basepath MUST end in a trailing slash!
basepath = ./
serialpath = \\.\pipe\YACardEmu
targetdevice = S31R
;
; Optional
;
autoselectedcard = card.bin

Intel Shader Fix

  • Download fix here.
  • Extract files to matching folder structure
BulletPoints: Both JP and Export versions should work.
Executable is "main" found in game's root folder.
Special thanks to Andy for his awesome work on this card emulator!
Download latest "YACardEmu-Release.zip" from https://github.com/GXTX/YACardEmu/releases
Extract archive somewhere and copy "config.ini.sample" to "config.ini"
Open "config.ini" to make following edits
Edit "basepath =" and set to wherever you want to save your card data. basepath MUST end in a trailing slash!
Edit "serialpath =" to "serialpath = \\.\pipe\YACardEmu"

Card can be inserted through any web browser, just access via the IP of whatever machine is running the emulator. (ie. 192.168.1.2:8080)	or by pressing whatever key you have bound to swipe card in TPUI.

Card can be inserted through any web browser, just access via the IP of whatever machine is running the emulator. (ie. 192.168.1.2:8080)	or by pressing whatever key you have bound to swipe card in TPUI.

CommonIssues.Question: Test menu continously scrolls through options
CommonIssues.Answer: Press Shift Down one time or more times until you are in neutral gear to stop the scrolling. (Only happens if debug mode is enabled)

CommonIssues.Question: Wheel calibration is off, car pulls to the side, pedals not working in-game
CommonIssues.Answer: Go to the test menu, IO Test and then initialize I/O to reset calibration

CommonIssues.Question: Inserting a card shows an error and I have to reboot the game
CommonIssues.Answer:
Go into your card folder and remove card0, then next time you start the game, do NOT click yes on the first card prompt (which asks if you have one)
							instead, click no, and then click yes on the next one which is asking if you want to buy a new card. Otherwise the card emu will create a 0kb empty card that can't be loaded.

Name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5
Description: Released on Namco ES3B in 2014.

BulletPoints: Executable is "wmnr5.exe" found in game's root folder.

SetupDetails.Details: Recommended wheel rotation: 270 degrees

CommonIssues.Question: I am stuck at "Connecting to Wangan Terminal"
CommonIssues.Answer:
Make sure TerminalEmulator is ticked, and that NetworkAdapterIP is set to 0.0.0.0 
							unless you're playing online. If you have too many network adapters installed on your PC,
							you may need to remove/disable them except for your primary network adapter.

CommonIssues.Question: Why is my car drifting to the side constantly?
CommonIssues.Answer: Go into the TEST menu and calibrate your steering.

CommonIssues.Question: What is TerminalMode?
CommonIssues.Answer:
TerminalMode makes the game emulate the Terminal function rather 
							then the racing cabinet function. With WMMT5, the cabinets all get 
							their information like closing times and whether they're set to 
							FreePlay or not from the Wangan Terminal cabinet, a standup machine 
							that has a touchscreen that's used for customising cars on a 
							Banapassport. Since we don't support Banapassport for WMMT5, 
							TerminalMode has no use except for if you want to run the game in 
							Event Mode with multiple machines, which can actually be emulated 
							by our TerminalEmulator now.

CommonIssues.Question: What does the text in the yellow box mean?
CommonIssues.Answer: It's just informing you that Banapassport cannot be used at this time.
